QuestData.Title: Equipment Recovery
QuestData.Description: Please, $n. When the Hyldnir took our men, they also took all our equipment. Of course, it's more important that we get our boys back, but if you run into any of our equipment, I'd really appreciate it if you brought it back to us.$B$BYou'll find their village just above us, to the north.
QuestData.LogDescription: Gretchen Fizzlespark wants you to obtain 8 pieces of K3 Equipment in Sifreldar Village north of K3.
QuestData.RewardText: Thanks, $n! We'll see what we can do to salvage these parts!
